name: Calico Collection
description:
Prototype

This prototype is playable on Windows and was built for the second phase of Greenlight jam. Important Notes: press Space Bar from within any minigame to return to the main menu. The second minigame and the Zen mode are not yet implemented, and all 3 functioning minigames are "bare bones" without win or lose conditions.

Program/Language: Processing + Java

This game is created entirely with code - no art assets are used at this time.

Diversifiers

Greenlight diversifier #4: Everyone Can Play - this game is being created with color blindness and dyslexia in mind, with large / high-contrast fonts and patterns in addition to colors (ie. the match3 minigame the matching cats are not just matched by color but also by combination of whiskers/nose/eyes).

Documentation

The Brainstorm PDF document contains the results of brainstorming and ideating in the first spring of the Greenlight jam, plus a brief production plan and a one-page design document of the chosen idea (a collection of cat-themed minigames).
